20110114140418.000|20110114140420.000|TR0|Kyra, U.S.-China relations have gone 
20110114140420.000|20110114140423.000|TR0|through a particularly rough patch in the 
20110114140423.000|20110114140425.000|TR0|last year or so.  There've been tensions 
20110114140425.000|20110114140428.000|TR0|on a whole host of issues.  The usual

20110114140440.000|20110114140442.000|TR0|United States has seen China sort of

20110114140445.000|20110114140447.000|TR0|and being unhelpful on important issues

20110114140847.000|20110114140849.000|TR0| DR. SANJAY GUPTA, CNN CHIEF MEDICAL 
20110114140849.000|20110114140851.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Yes, I mean, you know, and

20110114140904.000|20110114140906.000|TR0|talked about a couple of days ago, Kyra.
20110114140906.000|20110114140909.000|TR0|
20110114140909.000|20110114140911.000|TR0|You know he's a remarkable guy.  He's an 
20110114140911.000|20110114140913.000|TR0|astronaut, as you know. He was in Houston

20110114143255.000|20110114143257.000|TR0|years.
20110114143257.000|20110114143259.000|TR0|
20110114143259.000|20110114143302.000|TR0|In church law, there is a rule that there 
20110114143302.000|20110114143304.000|TR0|is supposed to be a five-year waiting 
20110114143304.000|20110114143307.000|TR0|period between someone's death and the 
20110114143307.000|20110114143309.000|TR0|beginning of a sainthood process.  
20110114143309.000|20110114143312.000|TR0|Benedict XVI waved for John Paul II.  That 
20110114143312.000|20110114143314.000|TR0|was in response both to popular demand -- 
20110114143314.000|20110114143316.000|TR0|I mean, you will remember those images 
20110114143316.000|20110114143319.000|TR0|during the pope's funeral mass, where you 
20110114143319.000|20110114143321.000|TR0|had the crowd chanting, "Santo Subito," 
20110114143321.000|20110114143324.000|TR0|meaning "Sainthood now."
20110114143324.000|20110114143326.000|TR0|
20110114143326.000|20110114143329.000|TR0|KIRAN CHETRY, CNN ANCHOR, "AMERICAN 
20110114143329.000|20110114143331.000|TR0|MORNING":  Right.
20110114143331.000|20110114143334.000|TR0|

20110114143343.000|20110114143346.000|TR0|Benedict did that.

20110114143351.000|20110114143353.000|TR0|aside from getting rid of the waiting
